item.title: Apache Kafka Series : Introduction to Apache Kafka
item.description: I recently had the chance to start working with Apache Kafka as a part of a new module I’m working on at my workplace. So this is just me noting down my thoughts about my experience with Kafka as a series of articles. What is Apache Kafka? Apache Kafka is a popular distributed event processing or event streaming platform. Kafka contains three main capabilities under the hood, which we can use for our event streaming workloads.
